appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Stay productive and focused with our free site blocker, custom blocklist, password protection, and Pop up blocker. Block websites, ads, and other distractions - ensuring your privacy and protection. Adblock for Facebook, Adblock for YouTube, and more - all to help you stay focused.

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.
